titles.title: I’ve Found The One Of Peerless Worth

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Christ, He is the Smitten Rock Whence living waters burst. He is the fountain in my heart, Which quenches all my thirst.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ is my life, my light, my way, My comfort and my health, My peace, my rest, my joy. my hope, My glory and my wealth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ is my wisdom and my power, My boast and righteousness, My vict’ry and redemption sure, My truth and holiness.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Christ is my Savior, Shepherd, Lord, My advocate above, My counselor, my Father, God, My brother, friend, and love.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
